title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah: Air Strikes on Terror Infrastructure in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Terrorist Cells and Terror Infrastructure: The IDF Continues to Strike in Lebanon

During the night, several Hezbollah operatives were identified entering a military structure in the Yaron area, which serves as an ammunition storage facility. Shortly thereafter, an Air Force aircraft attacked the structure containing the cell. Simultaneously, a terror infrastructure of the organization was targeted in the Barashit area.

Following the alert regarding the penetration of hostile aircraft in the northern region, activated at 7:34, a UAV crossed from Lebanese territory into northern Israel and crashed in the Metula area, with no casualties reported. Following the alert activated at 7:58, no crossing into Israeli territory was detected, and the incident concluded.

Earlier today, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target near Kfar Eliezer. An alert was activated in the area in accordance with policy.

Attached is documentation of the strikes: https://we.tl/t-Lt7nj8t7tT
